action_title: Introduce and enforce regulations for sustainable hunting of marine and freshwater mammals for traditional subsistence and handicrafts
key_messages:
Key Messages:

We found no studies that evaluated the effects of introducing regulations for sustainable hunting of marine and freshwater mammals for traditional subsistence and handicrafts.

‘We found no studies’ means that we have not yet found any studies that have directly evaluated this action during our systematic journal and report searches. Therefore we have been unable to assess whether or not the action is effective or has any harmful impacts. Please get in touch if you know of such a study for this action.
